description:
Are you Innocent or Guilty? A story of sinister magic, play and makes decisions in this evil adventure, a dark game with scary story where you will have to prove your innocence, or you will be condemned guilty in hell.

You will find an esoteric and dystopian world where you will have to demonstrate your innocence.

What makes Occultism:Interrogation so interesting?

You must answer their questions correctly. If you do not respond quickly or your memory fails you, you will be found guilty and you will be punished.
Each interrogation that you survive will bring you a step closer to your goal.

More than 20 esoteric and occult questions.
Multiple ends as you prove your innocence.
Think fast, time runs out according to your guilt level.
A new interrogator each time you enter the occult sect.
name: Occultism Interrogation: The ritual of little nightmares
intro: Can you prove your INNOCENCE? Overcome the Devil's interrogation. Experience the stress of making decisions. An esoteric and horror game that will test your memory.
